input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Balsam Colorado Mountain Spruce Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Frosted Alpine Balsam Fir Tree'
  - Name='WELLFOR 7-Feet Pre-lit Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights AP-HGY-2114'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 5.5ft Pre-Lit Classic Blue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pencil White Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='Charlton Home 7' Tall Pre-Lit Slim Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 12' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Lighted Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='WELLFOR 4-Feet Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights CM-HJY-23486US'
  - Name='WELLFOR 7-Feet Pre-lit Pencil Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights CM-HJY-23667US'
  - Name='Red Barrel Studio Edmonton Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Light Show Memory Shape Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Sierra Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ebern Designs Tall Pre-Lit Slim Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 5-Feet Pre-Lit Alpine Artificial Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Frosted Scotch Pine Christmas Tree w Branch Tips'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Artificial Full Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 Glowing Micro LEDs'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Artificial Full Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 Twinkling Micro LEDs'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Prelit Pencil Christmas Tree Spruce Style Holiday Decor w Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 6.5 ft.'
  - Name='National Tree Company 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Multicolor ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Colorado Mountain Spruce Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pre-lit artificial tree similar in function, but the specific type is Colorado Mountain Spruce and it is a flip tree versus hinged branch downswept Douglas Fir, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Frosted Alpine Balsam Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, matching species somewhat (Balsam Fir vs Douglas Fir), but no indication of pre-lit or branch construction, frost finish differs from natural look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 7-Feet Pre-lit Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights AP-HGY-2114
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and artificial, but pencil (slim) shape contrasts with downswept full silhouette, reducing relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim flip tree differs in shape and branch mechanism from downswept hinged branches; pre-lit status not explicit but likely. Moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Narrow silhouette is less similar to full downswept; different species (spruce), no mention of pre-lit features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 5.5ft Pre-Lit Classic Blue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial spruce tree closer in features, but smaller in height and different species, not downswept shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pencil White Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil (slim) tree shape is significantly different from downswept full-bodied tree; species is fir but likely less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species and pre-lit LED similar; dual color LEDs may differ from clear lights but otherwise likely similar construction and usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home 7' Tall Pre-Lit Slim Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree but slim shape differs substantially from downswept full form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 12' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir, though much taller than 6.5 ft; size difference reduces perfect match but relevant in type and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Lighted Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit lighted tree but pine species differs from fir; function similar but less species match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fraser fir is close relative to Douglas Fir; pre-lit with clear lights matches reference; slim silhouette less aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 4-Feet Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights CM-HJY-23486US
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller in size and flocked (snow effect); downswept natural look differs; shape not specified but likely not as full; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 7-Feet Pre-lit Pencil Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights CM-HJY-23667US
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil slim shape and flocked finish differ from downswept full body and natural branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Red Barrel Studio Edmonton Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Light Show Memory Shape Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir artificial tree matches species and function; light show features differ from simple clear bulbs; relevancy moderate.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Sierra Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flocked artificial tree likely with different shape and finish; function similar but less realistic natural look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ebern Designs Tall Pre-Lit Slim Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir is similar but slim shape diverges from downswept full silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 5-Feet Pre-Lit Alpine Artificial Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit alpine artificial tree with smaller size; species differs slightly; functionally close but smaller and possibly different styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Frosted Scotch Pine Christmas Tree w Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit with branch tips aligns with construction features; species is Scotch pine rather than Douglas fir; frosted finish differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Artificial Full Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 Glowing Micro LEDs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full artificial fir with realistic lighting technology; likely similar in construction and purpose to downswept Douglas fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Artificial Full Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 Twinkling Micro LEDs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above but with twinkling lights; functionally close to reference with pre-lit full fir construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Prelit Pencil Christmas Tree Spruce Style Holiday Decor w Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pencil slim silhouette spruce differs substantially in shape and species; lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 6.5 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, fir type, and height close to reference; highly similar likely similar branch construction but unknown pre-lit status; very relevant.
